title: Dashboard exception when route `admin_admin_user_path` isn't provided
body:
When visiting `/admin` dashboard (given being logged in), I get the following error:

```
actionpack (3.2.14) lib/action_dispatch/routing/polymorphic_routes.rb:129:in `polymorphic_url'
actionpack (3.2.14) lib/action_dispatch/routing/polymorphic_routes.rb:135:in `polymorphic_path'
actionpack (3.2.14) lib/action_view/helpers/url_helper.rb:111:in `url_for'
arbre (1.0.1) lib/arbre/element.rb:175:in `method_missing'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/namespace.rb:162:in `block (2 levels) in build_default_utility_nav'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/view_helpers/method_or_proc_helper.rb:86:in `instance_exec'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/view_helpers/method_or_proc_helper.rb:86:in `render_in_context'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/menu_item.rb:71:in `url'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/menu_item.rb:92:in `real_url?'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/menu_item.rb:78:in `display?'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/menu.rb:73:in `block in items'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/menu.rb:73:in `select'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/menu.rb:73:in `items'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/views/tabbed_navigation.rb:27:in `menu_items'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/views/tabbed_navigation.rb:37:in `build_menu'
/home/jon/dev-forks/active_admin/lib/active_admin/views/tabbed_navigation.rb:22:in `build'
```

This is a regression on master introduced by rev 33429ed, on [`lib/active_admin/namespace.rb:162`](https://github.com/gregbell/active_admin/blob/33429ed5ee004e4c7807c56874323c34d05e223e/lib/active_admin/namespace.rb#L162).

Debugging gave the following:

``` irb
pry(#<ActiveAdmin::Views::TabbedNavigation>)> [active_admin_namespace.name, current_active_admin_user]
=> [:admin, #<AdminUser id: 2, [...]>]
```
